title: Reform secures first seat on council in crushing defeat for Labour as PM fights for his political life
tags: Membership;topped the polls;Panic stations for Keir Starmer as Reform secures win in Labour heartland amid mounting fury over election delays;Dismal night of by-elections yields just one consolation prize for Labour as Lib Dems triumph;Labour's stronghold crumbles in double election blow as Keir Starmer rocked by shock result - but who won?;The GB News Editorial Charter
